original_text: Then Jesus laid his hands on his eyes again; and he opened his eyes, his sight was restored, and he saw everything clearly.
korean_text: 이에 그 눈에 다시 안수하시매 그가 주목하여 보더니 나아서 모든 것을 밝히 보는지라

sentences.original_text: Then Jesus laid his hands on his eyes again
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 예수께서 다시 그의 눈에 손을 얹으셨다
